documents.document: @jamesrbuk And that’s before you get into that stuff that’s not quite fake news but it isn’t wholly true either.
Am still no closer to understanding the point of council debates / motions against (or for) Trump.

@thomaswilliams @janinegibson I know they do. I see several local eateries doing it.
Might sell my BT & ITV shares on Monday to buy a lettuce farm - I could retire from the political news thing and breed lettuces full-time.

@janinegibson and a GPS-enabled courier bike went to Heathrow and drove to me in SW London. 😁
@janinegibson After I complained and complained and complained the ‘we have no stock, we’re making them as fast as we can line’ evaporated

She’s missed more than she realises. https://t.co/vzcPFzn1uA
@janinegibson Certain big tech firms do hide their new gadgets in a warehouse near Heathrow to generate ‘shortages’ and so more demand.
@forwardnotback @soverybritish You missed the ‘nervously ask another passenger / on-board staff member’ step.
@janinegibson She’s right. Or local restaurants are shopping on the hight street rather than the wholesalers.

But for the set & theme tune you’d be forgiven for mistaking this week’s Grand Tour for an episode of Top Gear. Not Chris Evans TG, obv.
@jameswharton Sarcasm seems to be lost on 95% of Twitter. I have no idea how they cope with life.

@rob_marchant Stronger than most of the rest of Europe’s.
@rob_marchant Well the first is rampant optimism but the second is a fact - we have one of the strongest militaries in the world.
I almost don’t want to watch - it’s the final @thegrandtour. It’s already almost over. :(
@keiranpedley @stephenkb Why isn’t ‘We’ll let in a number of skilled workers with firm job offers to help grow our economy’ their policy?

@rob_marchant If they’re nice to us, we can help with both of those.
@bake_down @stephenkb an uncertainty on their part and encourages them to reconsider the claimed rigidity of the rules.
@bake_down @stephenkb Yes, that’s my point. By saying we’ll quit the institutions after unexpectedly (to them) voting to leave, it creates

@election_data @pickardje Oh yes, I’ve always taken that as my starting point.
@election_data @pickardje Fair. I’m not sure some of the MPs know what it is having listened to the debates this week.
@election_data @pickardje but don’t seem to ask ‘why’ and I suspect a lot of the dissatisfaction is impatient leavers.
@election_data @pickardje Point I was failing to make was: Pollsters ask people whether they’re happy or unhappy with how Govt handling A50
@dronkarsahota @jennettearnold I have a GP 5 mins from me, I just need to go and do it!
@election_data @pickardje Yes. That wasn’t quite my point but it was my fault for trying to squeeze it into a single Tweet.
This week they’re all too busy passing motions to condemn Trump. https://t.co/y4QXHF1Pbk
@pickardje It disappoints me pollsters failing to ask WHY? to the ‘Govt is handling Brexit badly’ Q. I suspect the delay is a big factor.
@dronkarsahota @jennettearnold I guess I’ll finally have to register for one! Thanks.
@rob_marchant Of course, it’s also under threat from him and the other tone-deaf Eurocrats. But always easier to blame others.

Why does the boss always get to be a white guy? Why doesn’t this provoke calls for changes in the BBC’s casting of the show?
Notice how noone calls on the BBC to cast a female lead in Death in Paradise? 3 white men in a row leading a BME team & no-one complains?
@robertcorp :O
@attitudemag could I bring my dog into the office and would I get a free subscription?
. @johnharris1969 how can they not see that this creates an incentive for ALL Tories to boycott their amendments?
. @johnharris1969 I don’t understand why Labour MPs keep threatening to kill their own party if the Govt doesn’t accept its amendments.
@fles__ @felicityhannah Not sure poor Freema Agyeman would agree with that sentiment.
@felicityhannah Ghostbusters flopped.
@felicityhannah Though again the poor actor who gets the role will forever be ‘the first non-white actor to play the part’
@felicityhannah But no reason, for example, why the Doctor has to be white.
@felicityhannah I don’t think casting women in big dramas is bad. I think casting a female Doctor would be bad for the show.
@felicityhannah That’s fine. Though I do happen to know quite a lot of longterm Who fans. It’s not like I’m making this up.
@felicityhannah revenues, especially as Top Gear is no longer a guaranteed earner thanks to Chris Evans.
@felicityhannah They wouldn’t even tune in to see. Also, BBC isn’t likely to take the chance - it desperately needs the show’s commercial
@felicityhannah They’d fall instantly - large number of fans simply have no idea in watching a show with a female lead. Rightly or wrongly.
@felicityhannah not seen it and it full of good quality, well written women and gay boys.
@felicityhannah that’s why I say it’s better to create new shows and new franchises which find an audience. And Class is very good if you’ve
@felicityhannah but ultimately this - such a change would almost certainly further weaken the ratings and the actress would carry the can
@felicityhannah a) The master didn’t regenerate though - he’s out of bodies b) it was a cheap troll by a hack writer needy for headlines
@robertcorp That’s one spelling of it.
@felicityhannah into creating new franchises, not repurposing old ones and claiming that’s diversity sorted. Because it’s kind of cheating.
@felicityhannah The BBC SHOULD create more prime time roles for woman inc in sci-fi and other genres. But they (the BBC) should put the work
@felicityhannah I see it as simply as this ‘it’s a male role’ just as Dot Cotton is a female role.
@felicityhannah Yeah, that’s crap.
@felicityhannah I can offer you better reason why it’s not the best option https://t.co/ATKpt4w4uK
@stopcityairport Vague because it’ll need agreement from ROI and, some elements, from EU.
@stopcityairport We could have a hard border, your right. But I’m just saying several other options exist which can avoid one.
@stopcityairport Claim asylum in NI? Sure. Stay illegally in NI? It’s not big enough.
@stopcityairport Why don’t you call me and I’ll explain it in mere seconds rather than in copious tweets, you tart! ;-) x
